title: Sample, 1972-75-58, ca. 1948
medium:
Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 18 x 18 cm (7 1/16 x 7 1/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Plain weave with paired warps with every fifth weft in another 2/2 sequence. Warp is orange two-ply string. Weft is a repeating sequence of orange six-ply yarn, pink chenille, three rows of flat metallic gold paired with orange string, green six-ply yarn, green chenille, flat metallic silver paired with wrapped metallic silver. Four plain weave on paired warp. Five weft in another 2/2 sequence.
